author: Jay Greene
title: Salesforce Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Salesforce.com Inc. is scheduled to report fiscal fourth-quarter earnings after the market closes Wednesday. Hereâ€™s what you need to know.
EARNINGS FORECAST: Analysts surveyed by S&P Global Market Intelligence expect Salesforce to report adjusted earnings of 34 cents a share for the quarter ended Jan. 31, up from 28 cents a year earlier. Adjusted results exclude items such as amortization and stock-based compensation.
